mapper.select: select buy.*, c.type_name as course_name from stu_course buy inner join course_type c on buy.course_type_id=c.pkid where sid=#{sid}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_course (pkid, sid, course_type_id, num, fee, create_date, end_date) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into stu_course
pkid,
sid,
course_type_id,
num,
fee,
create_date,
end_date,
#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update stu_course
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
course_type_id = #{courseTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update stu_course set sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_type_id = #{courseTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
